decision_conditions:
Condition 3 of the planning permission is amended as follows:

description: Non-material amendments of Planning permission ref: P2022/1898/FUL, dated 23/03/2023. The amendment seeks the removal of two trees which are located beyond the scope of the Phase 1A Arboricultural Method Statement but which now need to be removed to facilitate piling associated with Phase 1A.
